original_text: The Israelites had to pay eight grams of silver for the Philistines to make each plough or hoe sharp again. They paid four grams of silver for each axe, knife or ox-goad.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 괭이나 삽이나 쇠스랑이나 도끼나 쇠채찍이 무딜 때에 그리하였으므로

sentences.original_text: The Israelites had to pay eight grams of silver
for the Philistines to make each plough
sentences.korean_translation: 필리스티아 사람들이 각 쟁기를 만들기 위해
또는 괭이를 다시 날카롭게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: They paid four grams of silver
